The comments that are shown to the right of the dual asterisks (**) explain functionality and are optional: ===> XEDIT LNXPDFLT DIRECT A Figure 6-8 Contents of the LNXPDFLT PROFILE that is created The following information refers to Figure 6-8: – The three COMMAND lines give the virtual machine access to virtual switch VSW1 at logon when the virtual machine is created, which precludes the need to add a VSWITCH GRANT statement each time that a Linux virtual machine is created. – The two CPU lines define two virtual CPUs.
